member.name: T:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper
member.summary: A wrapper for the discord client from the "DSharpPlus" discord client library. (https://github.com/DSharpPlus/DSharpPlus)

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.#ctor(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: E:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.VoiceServerUpdated
member.summary: An asynchronous event which is triggered when the voice server was updated.

member.name: E:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.VoiceStateUpdated
member.summary: An asynchronous event which is triggered when a user voice state was updated.

member.name: P:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.CurrentUserId
member.summary: Gets the current user snowflake identifier value.

member.name: P:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.ShardCount
member.summary: Gets the number of total shards the bot uses.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the wrapper and unregisters all events attached to the discord client.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.GetChannelUsersAsync(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Gets the snowflake identifier values of the users in the voice channel specified by (the snowflake identifier of the voice channel).
member.param: the guild identifier snowflake where the channel is in
the snowflake identifier of the voice channel
member.returns:
a task that represents the asynchronous operation
the snowflake identifier values of the users in the voice channel

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.InitializeAsync
member.summary: Awaits the initialization of the discord client asynchronously.
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.SendVoiceUpdateAsync(System.UInt64,System.Nullable{System.UInt64},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a voice channel state update asynchronously.
member.param: the snowflake identifier of the voice channel to join (if the client should disconnect from the voice channel).
a value indicating whether the bot user should be self deafened
a value indicating whether the bot user should be self muted
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.OnVoiceServerUpdated(DSharpPlus.EventArgs.VoiceServerUpdateEventArgs)
member.summary: The asynchronous callback when a voice server update was received.
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DiscordClientWrapper.OnVoiceStateUpdated(DSharpPlus.EventArgs.VoiceStateUpdateEventArgs)
member.summary: The asynchronous callback when a voice state update was received.
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: T:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DSharpUtil
member.summary: An utility for getting internal / private fields from DSharpPlus WebSocket Gateway Payloads.

member.summary: Gets the internal "SessionId" property value of the specified .

member.summary: Gets the "VoiceToken" property value of the specified .

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.DSharpPlus.DSharpUtil.GetWebSocketClient(DSharpPlus.DiscordClient)
member.summary: Gets the internal "_webSocketClient" field value of the specified .
